trans-unit.resname: WOT·3 | Grasp of Fate | Card Text

trans-unit.resname: WOT·3 | Grasp of Fate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The witch wrapped her heart in briar vines, hid it away in the ancient keep in the depths of the forest. If none could find it, the prophecy could never come to pass."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*

trans-unit.target: As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

trans-unit.source: "For slaying dozens of redcaps using only fruit and cakes, the dwarven survivors were dubbed the Gluttoneers."\n—*Assault on Delverhaugh*

trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

trans-unit.source: "Tugrunn threw blow after blow, howling with pain as his fist met solid rock. The creature merely stared quizzically at him, unsure when the fight would start."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*

trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.

trans-unit.source: "The feud between dwarves and redcaps had raged for so long that no one could quite recall how it started. Few would believe it was sparked by a long-ago dispute over a spoon."\n—*Assault on Delverhaugh*

trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: Smothering Tithe
trans-unit.target: Smothering Tithe

trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

trans-unit.source: As Foretold
trans-unit.target: As Foretold

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.

trans-unit.source: Kindred Discovery
trans-unit.target: Kindred Discovery

trans-unit.source: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Omniscience
trans-unit.target: Omniscience

trans-unit.source: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

trans-unit.source: Rhystic Study
trans-unit.target: Rhystic Study

trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

trans-unit.source: Bitterblossom
trans-unit.target: Bitterblossom

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: Grave Pact

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

trans-unit.source: Necropotence
trans-unit.target: Necropotence

trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
trans-unit.target: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

trans-unit.source: Polluted Bonds
trans-unit.target: Polluted Bonds

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

trans-unit.source: Aggravated Assault
trans-unit.target: Aggravated Assault

trans-unit.source: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.source: Blood Moon
trans-unit.target: Blood Moon

trans-unit.source: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
trans-unit.target: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

trans-unit.source: Repercussion
trans-unit.target: Repercussion

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

trans-unit.source: Sneak Attack
trans-unit.target: Sneak Attack

trans-unit.source: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.resname: WOT·100 | Defense of the Heart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Defense of the Heart
trans-unit.target: Defense of the Heart

trans-unit.resname: WOT·100 | Defense of the Heart | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: Doubling Season
trans-unit.target: Doubling Season

trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

trans-unit.source: Nature's Will
trans-unit.target: Nature's Will

trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
trans-unit.target: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.

trans-unit.source: Parallel Lives
trans-unit.target: Parallel Lives

trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
